languages.text: {n}Воины культа беспокойно переглядываются.{/n} "Запретить нам служить тебе и Ему через Завет Паутины — все равно что бросить меч к ногам врага в пылу битвы".

{n}The cultists glance at one another uneasily.{/n} "Would you cast down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle? How can we be an instrument of the Undying One's will if you forbid us from serving you through the Tenets?"
languages.original_text: {n}Воины культа беспокойно переглядываются.{/n} "Запретить нам служить тебе и Ему через Завет Паутины — все равно что бросить меч к ногам врага в пылу битвы".

traits.locale_text: {n}The cult's warriors exchange uneasy glances.{/n} "To forbid us from serving you and Him through Ahn'shini would be like casting down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle."
{n}The cult's warriors exchange uneasy glances.{/n} "To forbid us from serving you and Him through Ahn'shini would be like casting down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle."

{n}The cultists glance at one another uneasily.{/n} "Would you cast down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle? How can we be an instrument of the Undying One's will if you forbid us from serving you through Ahn'shini?"

{n}The cultists glance at one another uneasily.{/n} "Would you cast down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle? How can we be an instrument of the Undying One's will if you forbid us from serving you through Ahn'shini?"

{n}The cultists glance at one another uneasily.{/n} "Would you cast down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle? How can we be an instrument of the Undying One's will if you forbid us from serving you through the Tenets?"

{n}The cultists glance at one another uneasily.{/n} "Would you cast down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle? How can we be an instrument of the Undying One's will if you forbid us from serving you through the Tenets?"

languages.text: {n}Les cultistes échangent des regards gênés.{/n} « Jetteriez-vous votre épée aux pieds de l'ennemi alors même que le combat fait rage ? Comment pouvons-nous être l'instrument de la volonté de l'Immortel si vous nous interdisez de servir par les Préceptes ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists glance at one another uneasily.{/n} "Would you cast down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle? How can we be an instrument of the Undying One's will if you forbid us from serving you through the Tenets?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les cultistes échangent des regards gênés.{/n} « Jetteriez-vous votre épée aux pieds de l'ennemi alors même que le combat fait rage ? Comment pouvons-nous être l'instrument de la volonté de l'Immortel si vous nous interdisez de servir par les Préceptes ? »

languages.text: {n}Los cultistas intercambian miradas incómodas.{/n} «¿Arrojaría su espada a los pies del enemigo en el fragor de la batalla? ¿Cómo podemos ser un instrumento de la voluntad del Inmortal si nos prohíbe servirl{mf|e|a} a través de la Doctrina?».
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists glance at one another uneasily.{/n} "Would you cast down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle? How can we be an instrument of the Undying One's will if you forbid us from serving you through the Tenets?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los cultistas intercambian miradas incómodas.{/n} «¿Arrojaría su espada a los pies del enemigo en el fragor de la batalla? ¿Cómo podemos ser un instrumento de la voluntad del Inmortal si nos prohíbe servirl{mf|e|a} a través de la Doctrina?».

languages.text: {n}信徒们不安地交换着目光。{/n}“你会在恶战正酣的时候，将手中的利刃丢在敌人脚下吗？如果你禁止我们通过教义为你服务，那我们该怎么履行不死之神的意志呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists glance at one another uneasily.{/n} "Would you cast down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle? How can we be an instrument of the Undying One's will if you forbid us from serving you through the Tenets?"

traits.locale_text: {n}信徒们不安地交换着目光。{/n}“你会在恶战正酣的时候，将手中的利刃丢在敌人脚下吗？如果你禁止我们通过教义为你服务，那我们该怎么履行不死之神的意志呢？”

languages.text: {n}魔女団の者達は、気まずそうにお互いを見つめた。{/n}「あなたは戦いのさなかに、敵の足元に剣を投げ捨てるのですか？教義を通してあなたに仕えることを禁じられてしまっては、私たちはどうやって不死の者の意思の道具になればよいのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists glance at one another uneasily.{/n} "Would you cast down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle? How can we be an instrument of the Undying One's will if you forbid us from serving you through the Tenets?"

traits.locale_text: {n}魔女団の者達は、気まずそうにお互いを見つめた。{/n}「あなたは戦いのさなかに、敵の足元に剣を投げ捨てるのですか？教義を通してあなたに仕えることを禁じられてしまっては、私たちはどうやって不死の者の意思の道具になればよいのでしょうか？」

languages.text: {n}Die Kultisten blicken einander unruhig an.{/n} "Würdet Ihr Euer Schwert inmitten der Schlacht dem Feind vor die Füße werfen? Wie können wir ein Instrument des Willens des Todlosen sein, wenn Ihr uns bietet, Euch durch die Grundsätze zu dienen?"
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists glance at one another uneasily.{/n} "Would you cast down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle? How can we be an instrument of the Undying One's will if you forbid us from serving you through the Tenets?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kultisten blicken einander unruhig an.{/n} "Würdet Ihr Euer Schwert inmitten der Schlacht dem Feind vor die Füße werfen? Wie können wir ein Instrument des Willens des Todlosen sein, wenn Ihr uns bietet, Euch durch die Grundsätze zu dienen?"

languages.original_text: {n}The cultists glance at one another uneasily.{/n} "Would you cast down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle? How can we be an instrument of the Undying One's will if you forbid us from serving you through the Tenets?"

languages.text: {n}Tarikatçılar, huzursuzca birbirlerine bakıyor.{/n} "İnsan, savaşın ortasında kılıcını düşmanının eline verir mi? İlkelerle sana hizmet etmemizi yasaklarsan Ölmeyen'in arzularını nasıl yerine getirebiliriz?"
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists glance at one another uneasily.{/n} "Would you cast down your sword at the enemy's feet in the heat of battle? How can we be an instrument of the Undying One's will if you forbid us from serving you through the Tenets?"
